Rulings.Tengu: ●The effect to increase the DEF of “Card Blocker” can be activated when the attack target is changed by “Card Blocker’s” own effect. The effect to change the attack target does not target. If you have multiple copies of “Card Blocker” on the field, you can only activate 1 of their effects to change the attack target when your opponent’s monster attacks. Sending up to 3 cards to the GY is a cost.

Rulings.Base:
1. The effect to increase the DEF of "Card Blocker" can be activated when the attack target is changed by the own effect of "Card Blocker".
2. The effect to change the attack target does not target.
3. If you have multiple copies of "Card Blocker" on the field, you can only activate 1 of their effects to change the attack target when your opponent's monster attacks.
4. Sending up to 3 cards to the GY is a cost.
